title: Misconfigured FTP Access
description: An organization's FTP server allows unauthorized access due to misconfigurations. Exploit the vulnerability and retrieve the flag.
hints: Review the FTP server's user access and authentication settings.
Consider using anonymous FTP login to explore accessible directories.
Search for the `flag.txt` file within the accessible directories.
learningObjectives: Understand how FTP services can be misconfigured
Learn to exploit misconfigurations for unauthorized file access
Practice using FTP clients from Kali Linux to access the server
